Package edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.klondike

Class WasteStrategy

java.lang.Object
edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.klondike.WasteStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
PileStrategy
class WasteStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements PileStrategy
This PileStrategy encapsulates the rules for the waste pile in Klondike. The only interaction allowed is to drag the top card to a tableau or foundation pile.
Author:
bhoward

  • Method Details

    • checkCanDrag

      public boolean checkCanDrag​(Pile waste)
      Description copied from interface: PileStrategy
      Check whether the given Pile allows packets of one or more cards to be dragged off of it. To avoid lag, this should do minimal computation and return quickly.
      Specified by:
      checkCanDrag in interface PileStrategy
      Returns:
      true if the Pile allows dragging

    • checkCanDrop

      public boolean checkCanDrop​(Pile waste, java.util.List<Card> packet)
      Description copied from interface: PileStrategy
      Check whether the given Pile will allow a particular Packet to be dropped on it. To avoid lag, this should do minimal computation and return quickly.
      Specified by:
      checkCanDrop in interface PileStrategy
      Returns:
      true if the Pile will allow the Packet to be dropped

    • checkStartDrag

      public boolean checkStartDrag​(Pile waste, java.util.List<Card> packet)
      Description copied from interface: PileStrategy
      Check whether the given Packet may be dragged off of the Pile.
      Specified by:
      checkStartDrag in interface PileStrategy
      Returns:
      true if the given Packet may be dragged away from the Pile

    • finishDrag

      public void finishDrag​(Pile waste, java.util.List<Card> packet, Pile target)
      Description copied from interface: PileStrategy
      Perform clean-up on the origin and target Piles after a drag is completed. The cards will have already been added to the target by the time this is called.
      Specified by:
      finishDrag in interface PileStrategy

    • handleClick

      public void handleClick​(Pile waste, int numCards)
      Description copied from interface: PileStrategy
      Respond to a click on some number of cards from the top of the given Pile. If only the top card is selected, numCards will be 1. If the Pile is empty, numCards will be 0.
      Specified by:
      handleClick in interface PileStrategy
